definition: to get excited/passionate/aroused to passion/to fall in love/on heat (of animals)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, 'she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我怀念过去那些美好的日子，”她动情地补充道。

sentences.english: Moving people with emotions and convincing them with reason, Premier Wen's speech received warm responses.
sentences.chinese: 温总理的演讲动情晓理，引起热烈反响。

sentences.english: This is one of the rare moments when Hessler’s emotions bleed into the writing.
sentences.chinese: 这是赫斯勒在书中少有的动情场面。

sentences.english: Give up on gushing and he may miss seeing that feminine trait.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不动情，他也许会想念这一女性特质的。

sentences.english: The child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子的悲惨遭遇即使最冷酷的心肠也会为之动情。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the change of female mice on learning-memory.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察雌鼠动情周期学习记忆能力的变化。

sentences.english: Aircraft in the field love to run around, worked up quickly, but can not relax.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在情场中东奔西跑，动情快，但也放不开。

sentences.english: He didn't expect that he would face an immovable audience.
sentences.chinese: 他没料到他将面对一群不动情的观众。

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, ' she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我怀念过去那些美好的日子，”她动情地补充道。

sentences.english: Games have captured the American heart and mind.
sentences.chinese: 体育比赛吸引了美国人的注意力并使之动情。
一十四，少女怀春动情丝。

sentences.english: He is trying to find out what turns  on women.
sentences.chinese: 他想探究女人动情的原因。

sentences.english: Want him only so not become enamoured , I am hands-off him.
sentences.chinese: 所以只要他不动情，我就不干涉他。

sentences.english: The president candidate drooled the reform measures.
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人过分动情地阐述改革措施。

sentences.english: Perhaps one day you and I will lose touch, but you should know I once fell for you.
sentences.chinese: 也许你我将行踪不明，但是你该知道我曾因你动情。

sentences.english: And she was very very moved at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 此时，他的妻子也十分动情。

definition: eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to choke with emotion/to choke with sobs
to stir up emotion/to arouse sympathy/moving
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
